meanings.definition: The chemical substances produced by plants.
meanings.sent1: Many scientists are fascinated by the diverse phytochemistries found in different plant species.
meanings.sent2: Researchers are studying the phytochemistries in medicinal herbs to understand their health benefits.
meanings.sent3: The phytochemistries in the flowers seemed to have a secret recipe for attracting bees.
meanings.sent4: The garden was a treasure trove of phytochemistries, each plant a unique chemical factory.
meanings.sent5: The phytochemistries in the leaves painted a vibrant palette of colors in the forest.

meanings.definition: The study of the chemical composition of plants.
meanings.sent1: Botanists delve into phytochemistries to uncover the mysteries of plant chemistry.
meanings.sent2: In college, I took a course on phytochemistries to learn about plant biochemistry.
meanings.sent3: The professor's passion for phytochemistries made the subject surprisingly engaging.
meanings.sent4: Exploring the world of phytochemistries felt like embarking on a thrilling chemical adventure.
meanings.sent5: The textbook on phytochemistries was filled with colorful illustrations of plant molecules.
